herosection.3: based in Cordoba, Argentina. Working towards creating software that makes life easier and more meaningful.

aboutsection.1: Hello everyone, my name is Ger√≥nimo I am a software developer
aboutsection.4: who lives in a quiet town in the south of C√≥rdoba, Argentina.
aboutsection.5: I was studying systems engineering at the National Technological University but I dropped out to get fully into the mud in the world of programming, which is what fills me. I finished a 6 month Fullstack programming bootcamp and to this day I am still updating my skills and taking courses.
aboutsection.6: I have a wide range of hobbies and passions that keep me busy. From playing paddle tennis, going to the gym, getting together with my friends. I am always looking for new experiences and I love to stay engaged and learn new things.
aboutsection.7: I believe that you should never stop growing and that is what I strive to do, I have a passion for technology and the desire to
aboutsection.8: always push the limits of what is possible
aboutsection.9: . I am excited to see where my career takes me and I am always open to new opportunities. üôÇ

1.name: FromZeroToDev
1.description: FromZeroToDev is an asynchronous course platform created in a group of 6 people using agile SCRUM methodologies. It has user authentication with Auth0, payment gateway, dashboard for the admin, mailing. We use TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind, MongoDB and Mongoose.

2.name: Gaming - E-Commerce
2.description: Gaming is an app made with Next.js, Strapi, Stripe as a payment gateway, AWS services and SASS, Formik, Yup libraries.

3.name: Pokemon
3.description: Pokemon App is an application I made for my individual bootcamp project #I'mHenry, using the stack of technologies: React, Redux, Node, Express and Sequelize.

4.name: Arbi'Track
4.description: I worked for 6 months as a fullstack developer at Arbi'Track, a company that provides accounting help to cryptocurrency arbitrageur. In this role, I have gained skill as a team leader and valuable insight into developing high-quality web applications.

5.name: Nike clone shoe store
5.description: This is a personal project I did to polish skills. On the frontend with Next.js 13 and TailwindCSS and on the backend with Strapi Headless CMS. And it is deployed in vercel and render.
